titleStmt.title: A second speech made by the Lord Lowden, in the Parliament of Scotland the 24. of Septemb. 1641. Being in answer to some objections made against the honourable designe of the Palatinate.
titleStmt.author: Loudoun, John Campbell, Earl of, 1598-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for I.M. at the George in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
